title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
No signs of oxidation.
Voltage: PBUS_g3h 8.59V; pp3v42_g3h 3.42V;PLT_RESET_L 0v; PM_SLP_S4_L 3.36V ; ALL_SYS_PWRGD 3.33V; pp3v3_SUS/S5 3.34V; PP5V_S0 5.13, *Vcore 1.72V, does not fall to 0.82V.

I imagine it is the Me Bios region.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
"Vcore 1.72V, does not fall to 0.82V"
Why do you expect that?
This is not 2936/3115 board...

Do you ger 3V at pin 3 of U1950?
Also check CPU_VCCST_PWRGD and CPU_VR_READY.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
0V on pin 3 q8150
CPU_VCCST_PWRGD 1.02V; CPU_VR_READY 0v, when I measure this line the cooler stops rotating.

[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 64272, member: 682"]
This is not 2936/3115 board...
[/QUOTE] I thought it was just as logical rsrs.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
"0V on pin 3 q8150"
Please read my post!!!

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: You should try full known good BIOS; many links on the forum...

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: PLT_RESET_L is low. Shouldn't it be high?

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
You have many links for clean ME BIOS on the forum.
Test first, to see if is BIOS problem...

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: No result with several BIOS here on the forum. Mac spins the cooler, but no video, no USB activity. I've already checked the resistors and Ci's u6100, u1900, u1950 and q8150, but it still has the same defect.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: the ci of the camera is heating up, is that normal ?[ATTACH type="full"]59389[/ATTACH]

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
Even if there is no oxidation, perform the Reball SMC ?

I would not like to condemn this mac.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: The board stays on now, fan spins continously?

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: As I said before, the cooler spins, with no sound it's turning on and no USB activity.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
Do you get VCORE and PLT_RESET_L?

Check with finger if U3900 really overheats.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
PLT_RESET_L 0V;  VCORE  1.7V; 
u3900 with the finger heats up little.

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message:
U3900 should not heat at all.
It doesn't work if PLT_RESET_L is low.
Check diode mode to ground at PLT_RSET_L.
You should test the board removing U3900...

title: 820-00165 does not turn on, cooler rotates.
message: Camera IC can warm up a little bit as soon as it receives power, usually irrelevant.
